description:
Prudential Rubloff Mobile is a FREE application that brings you the most accurate and up-to-date real estate information right to your phone! With Prudential Rubloff Mobile, you have access to all homes for sale or for rent as well as recently sold listings throughout the Chicagoland area.
Use Prudential Rubloff Mobile anytime, anywhere to pull up homes for sale around you using the GPS search, or find homes based on address, city or zip code. Prudential Rubloff Mobile will show you all the details you want to know about a property, including price, square footage, estimated mortgage, taxes, features, descriptions, pictures, maps and more! Save your favorite homes to view later. You can also text or email homes you like to your family and friends. 
If you have questions or want a tour of a home for sale, simply press the “Contact ” feature to connect to a Prudential Rubloff sales professional who can assist you.
We have 17 sales offices with over 900 sales professionals and staff in Chicago’s Gold Coast, Lincoln Park, Lakeview and South Loop, as well as Evanston, Glenview, Highland Park, Hinsdale, Lake Forest, Libertyville, Northbrook, Wheaton, Winnetka and Michigan’s Harbor Country. We can assist with your real estate needs whether you’re interested in single family, loft, condo, townhome, co-op, commercial property or vacant land. Prudential Rubloff offers a full suite of homeownership services including mortgage, title, home warranty and home inspection.
